sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of ju 疽 , impediment-illnesses, manifesting themselves as very serious conditions with an inauspicious prognosis. Qian jin yi fang 千金翼方 19: 露蜂房、亂髮、蛇皮， 三味合燒灰，酒服方寸匕，日二。主諸惡疽、附骨癰，根在臟腑 , “ Lu feng fang , luan fa and she pi , these three substances are to be mixed and burned to ashes. They are to be ingested with wine, a dose of one square-inch size spoon twice per day to master all types of malign impediment - illnesses , and obstruction-illnesses attached to the bones, with a root in the depots and palaces”.
